UI_visible_response: Read 5 web pagesView Page Details"The Song of Grass Mud Horse" is an internet meme that originated in China in the early 2000s. The term "Grass Mud Horse" is a homophone in Chinese for a vulgar phrase, and the song itself is a form of protest against internet censorship. It is often presented in a humorous and satirical manner, with the character of the Grass Mud Horse depicted as a mythical creature that overcomes obstacles, symbolizing the defiance of internet users against censorship. The song became popular online and was widely shared as a form of cultural resistance.CopyTry AgainShare
